title: CDA chairman for swift completion of ‘One Window facility’
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 24 (APP): Chairman Capital Development Authority (CDA), Muhammad Ali Randhawa visited the new One Window facility under construction here on Wednesday.
During his visit, he reviewed the ongoing construction work and expressed his satisfaction with the state-of-the-art design and facilities being implemented.
The Chairman emphasized the need for swift completion of the construction work, stating that the center will significantly enhance the efficiency of services provided to citizens once completed.
The new One Window facility is designed to offer a convenient and streamlined experience for the public, and its timely completion is crucial for meeting this objective.
The CDA is working diligently to ensure that the project is finished as soon as possible to deliver high-quality services to the citizens.
